languages.text: {n}В глазах друкари что-то вздрагивает. Он небрежно отмахивается.{/n} "Нет. Не его. Выбери кого-то другого".
{n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах друкари что-то вздрагивает. Он небрежно отмахивается.{/n} "Нет. Не его. Выбери кого-то другого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."
{n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

{n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光中闪烁着某种东西。他漫不经心地挥了挥手，拒绝了这个提议。{/n}“不，不要他，选别人吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我会找到办法，趁他措手不及的时候对他下手。”

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの目で何かが光る。男はその提案を軽く払い除けた。{/n}「いや、ソイツはダメだ。他の奴にしろ」
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの目で何かが光る。男はその提案を軽く払い除けた。{/n}「いや、ソイツはダメだ。他の奴にしろ」

languages.text: {n}Algo atraviesa fugazmente los ojos del Drukhari. Desecha la sugerencia con un ademán.{/n} «No. Él no. Elige a otro».
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

traits.locale_text: «Hum. Ya encontraré el modo de pillarlo desprevenido».

languages.text: {n}Une étincelle passe dans le regard du Drukhari qui écarte votre suggestion d'un geste désinvolte.{/n} « Non, pas lui. Choisissez quelqu'un d'autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Je trouverai bien un moyen de le prendre au dépourvu. »

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst ein Flackern in den Augen des Drukhari. Er winkt lässig ab.{/n} "Nein. Nicht ihn. Wählt jemand anderen aus."
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst ein Flackern in den Augen des Drukhari. Er winkt lässig ab.{/n} "Nein. Nicht ihn. Wählt jemand anderen aus."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin gözlerinde bir şeyler titreşiyor. Önerini gelişigüzel başından savıyor.{/n} "Hayır. O olmaz. Başkasını seç."
languages.original_text: {n}Something flickers in the Drukhari's eyes. He casually waves away the suggestion.{/n} "No. Not him. Choose someone else."
